name: Scary Paw - Pet Pup Vet
description:
Oh no! Your cute little pup's feet look very horrible and he's scared. Your pet was running on a dirty road and there he got injuries on his feet. He desperately needs your medical skills to treat his badly injured feet. Bring him to your clinic immediately. Use all your medical instruments in cleaning, disinfecting, and treating your pet's feet. Don't forget to wash the wounds with soap and water spray to remove all the germs, dirt, blood, and bacteria. Use your bandages for cuts and your tweezers to remove the splinters. It's time to be a foot doctor and help out these cute pet feet! Are you ready to give it a try?

Play now and make your pet happy again with healthy and beautiful feet.

HOW TO PLAY:

Touch the screen to start treating your dog's feet. Choose your pet character. Wash first all the dirt from the injuries. Choose the right medical instruments and medicines. Shake your device to remove splinters with tweezers. Exciting fun and educational game!
